title: Contributor Code of Conduct
text: contributors maintainers project, pledge respect people contribute reporting issues, posting feature requests, updating documentation, submitting pull requests patches, activities. committed making participation project harassment-free experience everyone, regardless level experience, gender, gender identity expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion. Examples unacceptable behavior participants include use sexual language imagery, derogatory comments personal attacks, trolling, public private harassment, insults, unprofessional conduct. Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct. Project maintainers follow Code Conduct may removed project team. Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported opening issue contacting one project maintainers. Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant (http://contributor-covenant.org), version 1.0.0, available http://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/0/0/

title: GNLegacyAPIManager — GNLegacyAPIManager
text: Inserts metadata file, XML object geometa object class    ISOMetadata ISOFeatureCatalogue. successful, returns Geonetwork    metadata internal identifier (integer). Extra parameters geometa_validate (TRUE     default) geometa_inspire (FALSE default) can used geometa objects     perform ISO INSPIRE validation respectively. case object class     geometa::INSPIREMetadataValidator, proper user API key, specified    geometa_inspireValidator argument.

text: Returns object class ISOMetadata (ISO 19115) ISOFeatureCatalogue (ISO 19110) (geometa package)

title: GNOpenAPIManager — GNOpenAPIManager
text: Inserts record file, XML object geometa object class ISOMetadata ISOFeatureCatalogue.     Extra parameters related geometa objects: geometa_validate (TRUE default) geometa_inspire     (FALSE default) can used perform ISO INSPIRE validation respectively. case object class     geometa::INSPIREMetadataValidator, proper user API key, specified geometa_inspireValidator     argument.

title: GNOpenAPIManager — GNOpenAPIManager

Default FALSE publishToAll publish . Default TRUE transformWith transform . Default _none_ schema schema extra extra geometa_validate validate geometa object geometa_inspire validate geometa object vs. INSPIRE geometa_inspireValidator geometa INSPIRE validator use

GeoNetwork REST API Manager Utils — GNUtils
text: Object R6Class static util methods communication REST API GeoNetwork instance.

title: GeoNetwork REST API Manager Utils — GNUtils
text: getUserAgent() method used get user agent performing GeoNetwork API requests.    user agent compound geonapi package name version. getUserToken(user, pwd) method used get user authentication token performing GeoNetwork    API requests. Token given Base64 encoded string. GET(url, path, token, verbose) method performs GET request given path GeoNetwork REST API PUT(url, path, token, filename, contentType, verbose) method performs PUT request given path GeoNetwork REST API,    upload file name filename given contentType POST(url, path, token, content, contentType, encode, verbose) method performs POST request given path GeoNetwork REST API,    post content given contentType DELETE(url, path, token, verbose) method performs DELETE request given GeoNetwork resource identified    path GeoNetwork REST API parseResponseXML(req) Convenience method parse XML response GeoNetwork REST API. Although package httr    suggests use xml2 package handling XML, geonapi still relies    package XML. Response httr retrieved text, parsed    XML 'xmlParse' function. getPayloadXML(obj) Convenience method create payload XML send GeoNetwork.

title: 'GeoNetwork' API R Interface — geonapi
text: Provides R interface 'GeoNetwork' API (<https://geonetwork-opensource.org/#api>) allowing upload publish metadata 'GeoNetwork' web-application expose OGC CSW  Web-Services (Catalogue Service Web).

title: geonapi 0.6 |
text: New features #15 Support attachements upload via Open API #23 Support thumbnail publication via Open API

title: geonapi 0.5-3 |
text: CRAN release: 2022-02-21 Bug fixes #21 Regression login & methods related Geonetwork API url

title: geonapi 0.5-2 |
text: CRAN release: 2022-01-26 New features #19 Support new parameter specifying custom INSPIRE metadata validator Miscs #22 Standardize R6-class R documentation

title: geonapi 0.5-1 |
text: CRAN release: 2022-01-14 Bug fixes #16 Issue GN login GN 3.8 - Missing lang service URL

title: geonapi 0.5 |
text: CRAN release: 2021-11-02 New features #2 Support new Geonetwork REST API (GN >= 3.2) - main CRUD methods #14 Add method get categories Enhancements #13 Issue Keyring >= 1.2.0 - system password requested - Set keyring ‘env’ backend default

title: geonapi 0.4 |
text: CRAN release: 2020-08-05 New features #10 Secure API password ‘keyring’

title: geonapi 0.3 |
text: CRAN release: 2019-11-08 Bug fixes #8 Fix crsf authorization GN > 3.2 Miscs #9 Integration tests major GN versions

title: geonapi 0.2-2 |
text: CRAN release: 2019-10-18 Enhancements #7 propagate geometa validate/inspire options insert/update methods

title: geonapi 0.2-1 |
text: CRAN release: 2019-05-26 New features #6 Method list user groups Enhancements #5 Test insertion / update multi-lingual metadata records

title: geonapi 0.2-0 |
text: CRAN release: 2018-08-14 New features # new http request token requirements (CSRF)
